title: Sample, "Achilles"
medium:
Medium: (a) cotton warp, wool weft;  (b) cotton warp, viscose rayon weft 
Technique: plain weave with float patterning
inscribed: Labels stapled to both pieces that are typewritten, "ARCHILLES"
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 12.7 x 20.3 cm (5 x 8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 10.2 x 20.3 cm (4 x 8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description:
a. Woven in tan, green and pale blue.
b. Woven in pale violet and two shades of red.
